video.title: Girl Meets World
video.synopsis: "Boy Meets World" couple Cory and Topanga Matthews are back in this sitcom that focuses on the continuing adventures of their young daughter.

episodes.synopsis: When Maya leads a rebellion in class, Riley tries to emulate her by joining in, much to the dismay of Cory.
episodes.title: Girl Meets World

episodes.synopsis: To teach the kids in his class how to communicate without technology, Cory confiscates all of their phones.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Boy

episodes.synopsis: Jealous when Missy starts flirting with Lucas, Riley enlists Maya and Farkle to help her learn how to flirt.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Sneak Attack

episodes.synopsis: Riley seeks advice from Topanga about how to end a long-standing father-daughter tradition so she can go to her first school dance.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Father

episodes.synopsis: When Riley lies to Farkle that his performance in a play was great, Farkle decides to quit his other activities and focus on his next audition.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the Truth

episodes.synopsis: Invited to a geek party, Riley decides to embrace her newfound popularity and become "Queen of the Geeks."
episodes.title: Girl Meets Popular

episodes.synopsis: When she fails to show up at school for career day, Maya's mother Katy lets her down once again, but the truth soon comes out.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Maya's Mother

episodes.synopsis: When Smackle realizes that Farkle only sees her as an academic rival, she enlists Maya and Riley to give her a makeover.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Smackle

episodes.synopsis: During a unit studying the 1960s, Cory gives the class a living history assignment and his students discover their ancestors knew each other.
episodes.title: Girl Meets 1961

episodes.synopsis: Cory divides his class into two fake companies: one driven by profits, the other by making people happy.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Crazy Hat

episodes.synopsis: It's Halloween, and Auggie hosts a night of spooky stories. Farkle is afraid of the ball in gym class, and Riley fears sleeping over at Maya's.
episodes.title: Girl Meets World: Of Terror

episodes.synopsis: Riley and Maya are forced to work in the school cafeteria while Lucas and Farkle are assigned janitorial duty.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the Forgotten

episodes.synopsis: When Riley, Maya and Lucas learn that Farkle is being targeted by a bully, they decide to take action.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Flaws

episodes.synopsis: Lucas, Riley and Farkle run against each other for seventh grade class president. Auggie wants Topanga and Cory to parent him together.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Friendship

episodes.synopsis: Cory and Topanga let Riley babysit Auggie for the first time while they go out for the evening, but they get stuck in a subway station.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Brother

episodes.synopsis: Cory's best friend from childhood, Shawn Hunter, joins the Matthews family for Christmas dinner at their home.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Home for the Holidays

episodes.synopsis: Riley invites Lucas and Farkle to join the traditional Matthews family game night, and Maya is excited when Uncle Josh joins in as well.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Game Night

episodes.synopsis: Maya wakes up on her 14th birthday and discovers that her mom isn't there for her. Riley and Cory set up Maya's mom with Shawn Hunter.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Master Plan

episodes.synopsis: Farkle is nominated for an award and must decide whether to take Riley or Maya to the awards dinner. Topanga forms a book club for Auggie and friends.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Farkle's Choice

episodes.synopsis: Lucas seeks Cory's permission to go on a date with Riley. Cory reluctantly agrees, as long as Maya and Farkle accompany them.
episodes.title: Girl Meets First Date

episodes.synopsis: As soon as it's Riley's turn to take the class fish home for the weekend, it dies. Auggie suspects foul play is involved.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Fish

episodes.synopsis: At a used clothing store, Riley is taken advantage of by a fast-talking saleswoman who convinces her to pay far too much for a dress she doesn't need.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Demolition

episodes.synopsis: On the first day of eighth grade, Riley and Maya look forward to having a history teacher that isn't Riley's father. Topanga gets a request.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Gravity

episodes.synopsis: When the kids at school start hounding Riley and Lucas about their relationship, things become awkward between them.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the New World

episodes.synopsis: Lucas's old friend from Texas transfers to John Quincy Adams Middle School. Cory uses an unusual method to teach the kids about the meaning of life.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the Secret of Life

episodes.synopsis: Cory, Shawn and Topanga go to Philadelphia to dig up a time capsule they buried there 15 years ago. Later, Riley and her pals make their own capsule.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Pluto

episodes.synopsis: Riley and Maya have a big argument that could end their friendship. To help them make up, Cory asks his brother Eric to listen to both of their sides.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Mr. Squirrels

episodes.synopsis: Riley lies to her parents so that she and Maya can sneak off to attend a college party. Maya is forced to face the truth about her crush.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the Tell-Tale Tot

episodes.synopsis: When Cory gives the class detention, the students split into two groups: one led by Riley, the other by Maya. Ava worries about losing her pal Auggie.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Rules

episodes.synopsis: Maya receives some advice and a gift. Shawn gets some advice of his own when his old girlfriend comes to town for a visit.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Hurricane

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Eric, who is running for the Senate, gets some bad news, the gang rallies to encourage him to continue his campaign.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Mr. Squirrels Goes To Washington

episodes.synopsis: When Cory defends a new English teacher who uses unconventional methods to motivate her students, he puts his own job in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the New Teacher

episodes.synopsis: Unhappy with what the school yearbook says they're "Most Likely" to do, Riley and Farkle reinvent themselves with completely different personalities.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Yearbook

episodes.synopsis: Riley feels torn when another boy, instead of Lucas, asks her to a big school dance. Meanwhile, Eric is visited by an old friend who seems lost.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Semi-formal

episodes.synopsis: When the school board makes plans to drop art and music classes from the curriculum, the students scramble to find a creative way to show their value.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Creativity

episodes.synopsis: IQ test results cause Farkle to question who he really is and where he belongs. Later, another student teaches him a lesson in compassion.
episodes.title: Girl Meets I am Farkle

episodes.synopsis: As Riley observes Cory and Topanga making a positive impact on the world, she wonders if her contributions will ever match those of her parents.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Cory and Topanga

episodes.synopsis: When Riley lashes out at Maya over an innocent comment, Farkle suspects there's something serious going on behind Riley's oversensitivity.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Rileytown

episodes.synopsis: Riley and Maya discover a mysterious resident living in the bay window of Riley's bedroom: a flapper from the 1920s who loves singing and dancing.
episodes.title: Girl Meets World of Terror 2

episodes.synopsis: Riley is determined to become a cheerleader, despite failing at previous tryouts. Will she finally make the cut this year? Even her pals have doubts.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Rah Rah

episodes.synopsis: Riley, Maya and Farkle go to Texas to cheer on Lucas, whom they've entered into a bull-riding contest, not knowing how difficult and dangerous it is.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Texas: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While the gang is in Texas, Zay reunites with his girlfriend. Meanwhile, Riley, Maya and Lucas try to sort out their feelings for one another.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Texas: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Maya and Lucas have problems communicating with each other. Meanwhile, Farkle suspects Riley is in denial about her true feelings.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Texas: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: When Cory assigns his students a project on forgiveness, Maya must decide whether she's ready to forgive her father for leaving her mother and her.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the Forgiveness Project

episodes.synopsis: Tensions build among Riley, Maya, Lucas and Farkle after they are paired off to work on reports that bring up their differing beliefs.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Belief

episodes.synopsis: Farkle gives Riley a strict deadline for revealing to everyone how she truly feels about Lucas. Meanwhile, Maya makes a New Year's resolution.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the New Year

episodes.synopsis: During science class, Riley notices the girls are not participating as fully as the boys in conducting an experiment, and decides to speak out.
episodes.title: Girl Meets STEM

episodes.synopsis: Farkle worries his family will become poor after his dad makes a risky investment. Meanwhile, Cory asks his class for ideas on helping those in need.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Money

episodes.synopsis: School honor board members Riley and Lucas disagree on how to handle a cheating case involving Maya and Farkle. Auggie decides on a career path.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Commonism

episodes.synopsis: Now that she's older, Riley decides to make some changes to the bay window. But Maya wants their special space and their lives to remain the same.
episodes.title: Girl Meets the Bay Window

episodes.synopsis: Before graduation, the students decide how to leave a lasting mark on their middle school. Cory learns what the future holds for him as a teacher.
episodes.title: Girl Meets Legacy
